description: Try our easy to follow Fish & Cauliflower Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cauliflower bake,Pescatarian,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Low sugar,Cauliflower,Salmon
name: Fish & Cauliflower Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Grease 4 x 1 1/2 cup-capacity ovenproof dishes.
Cook cauliflower florets in a saucepan of boiling, salted water for 2 minutes. Drain, combine with salmon and divide between prepared ovenproof dishes.

Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add flour and cook, stirring for 2 minutes until pale golden. Remove pan from heat and gradually whisk in milk until smooth. Return pan to heat and simmer for 3 minutes until mixture has thickened. Remove pan from heat and add herbs, eggs and mustard and stir well to combine. Season.

Pour the sauce mixture over the cauliflower and fish mixture in ovenproof dishes. Sprinkle over sour dough breadcrumbs. Top with grated cheese. Transfer ovenproof dishes to a large baking tray and bake for 10-15 minutes until golden. Serve.
